title: A short vievv of the Persian monarchie, and of Daniels weekes beeing a peece of Beroaldus workes: with a censure in some points.
author: Beroald, Matthieu, d. 1576.
notes: Translation by Hugh Broughton of an excerpt of: Beroald, Matthieu.  Chronicon Sacrae Scripturae auctoritate constitutum.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
